column4: what filesystem should I use for my data drives if I want to be able to pull them out and plug them into my mac and also have files >4gb
you may want to ask in the mac channel what linux type filesystems the macos supports.
I guess I was wondering how good the ubuntu support for hfs+ or ufs is
for hfs/hfs+ i think its readonly.. ie: proberly not good enough for your needs. I dont own a mac. i jsut see people asking in here about hfs all the time
